title: EkAmrEshanAyakIm IshvarIm
sahitya:
EkAmrEshanAyakIm IshvarIm bhajarE rE mAnasa


anupallavi

 mUka mukhya vAkpradAyinIm muktiprada guruguha pAlinIm


caraNam   kAncI nagara nivAsinIm kaivalya pradAyinIm naLinIm kali kalmaSa nAshinIm 
prapanca prakAshinIm bhakta vishvAsinIm vAnchita phala pradAyinIm sadAnanda vilAsinIm 
shambhu mOhinIm panca dashAkSarIm prasiddha kAmEshvarIm kanjalOcanIm
